definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 10:1 fly (as moving to and fro in the air? cf. Fl NHWB:i. 438 b; NH id., As. zumbu, Dl:S 63 f.; Ar. d-uba0bub, Aram. [[דִּיבָבָא]], debo0, dbobo0);—lit. only [[זְבוּבֵי מָוֶת]] Ec 10:1 i.e. dead flies; so AV RV Hi Now al.; > LXX De al. death-bringing, deadly flies; [[זְבוּב]] metaph. of Egyptian army Is 7:18 (‖[[דְּבוֹרָה]], bee, of Assyrian); on [[בַּעַל]] [[זְבוּב]] v. [[בַּעַל]] II.
